onyomiExamples.meaning: precise, accurate, appropriate, exactly the right
living a life of leisure with dignity, living quietly and comfortably free from worldly cares, otium cum dignitate

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to come true (of a wish, prayer, etc.), to be realized, to be fulfilled, to suit (e.g. a purpose), to meet (wishes, ideals, etc.), to conform to (standards, rules, etc.), to be consistent with, to match (implies competition), to rival, to bear (e.g. the heat)
